title: Timestamp for videos is incorrect
content:
Videos taken on my Pixel 3A have an incorrect time stamp - four hours ahead of when they were actually taken. For example, I took a video on 2020-09-17 at 12:00:07 but the time stamp on the video file is 2020-09-17 - 16:00:07 with a file name of PXL_20200917_160007814.mp4.

I have "Use network-provided time" set to On. I have "Use network-provided time zone" set to On. I have "Use 24-hour format" set to On.
